## Description {#details}

Track ephemeral values, which should be ignored for cost-modelling purposes.

Requires walking instructions in reverse order.

Definition at line 3028 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/simplifycfg-cpp">SimplifyCFG.cpp</a>.
